description.brief: Provides the tools to load a robot from a model into an envire representation.

package.description: The model of the robot that is stored either as URDF or as SMURF (extension of URDF) can be uploaded to a envireTransformationGraph with this tool. The components of the robot are localized as nodes o graph incorporate their relative positions (transformations)
package.author: Raul Dominguez/Raul.Dominguez@dfki.de
